directions: In a large skillet, brown the ground beef and onion. Drain well. Add tomatoes and water; bring to a boil.
Add macaroni and bring back to a boil. Reduce the heat to simmer and cook for 10 minutes or until macaroni is done. Sprinkle cheese on top and stir until cheese is melted.
ingredients: 1 (14.5 ounce) can RED GOLD® Petite Diced Tomatoes with Onion, Celery & Green Pepper
2 cups American processed cheese singles, shredded
title: Cheeseburger Macaroni from RED GOLD®
